bibl.title: AD 297 as the Beginning of the First Indiction Cycle.
bibl.note: A Coptic manuscript, Vat. copt. 69 (July 4, AD 933), may shed light on the way the indiction system came to be thought of, independent of how it actually developed at the end of the third and the beginning of the fourth century.
Depuydt Leo, AD 297 as the Beginning of the First Indiction Cycle.
